templateOptions.label: PSStuntman Module location
templateOptions.description: The path to the location where the PSStuntman dll files are saved

templateOptions.label: Amount
templateOptions.description: The stuntman are exported to a local SQLite database

templateOptions.label: ExternalId prefix
templateOptions.description: The ExternalId prefix e.g. 'Ext'. When left empty, the default prefix will be set to 'STUNTMAN'

templateOptions.label: UserId range
templateOptions.description: The UserId range e.g. '1'. This value will always increment with '1'. When left empty, the default UserIdRange will start from '0'

templateOptions.label: CompanyName
templateOptions.description: The CompanyName e.g. 'Contoso'. When left empty, a random CompanyName will be picked

templateOptions.label: DomainName
templateOptions.description: The DomainName e.g. 'contoso'. When left empty, the default DomainName will be set to 'enyoi'

templateOptions.label: Locale
templateOptions.description: The locale for the HID Stuntman e.g. 'fr' (for French) or 'en' (for English). The default locale is set to 'nl'. To find more locales: https://github.com/bchavez/Bogus

templateOptions.label: Generate new stuntman
templateOptions.description: Toggle this switch to generate new stuntman
